fewShots.question: Show cost per day of ace inhibitors in the state of florida for internists in the year 2020
fewShots.query:
SELECT d.Gnrc_Name AS Drug_Generic_Name, 
       (SUM(c.Tot_Drug_Cst) / NULLIF(SUM(c.Tot_Day_Suply),0)) AS Cost_Per_Day 
FROM [dbo].[cms_provider_drug_costs_star] c
JOIN [dbo].[cms_provider_dim_drug] d ON c.drug_key = d.drug_key
JOIN [dbo].[cms_provider_dim_geography] g ON c.geo_key = g.geo_key 
JOIN [dbo].[cms_provider_dim_provider] p ON c.provider_key = p.provider_key 
JOIN [dbo].[cms_provider_dim_year] y ON c.[Year] = y.[Year] 
WHERE d.Gnrc_Name LIKE '%pril%' AND g.Prscrbr_State_Abrvtn = 'FL' AND p.Prscrbr_Type LIKE '%Internal Medicine%' AND y.[Year] = 2020 
GROUP BY d.Gnrc_Name
ORDER BY Cost_Per_Day DESC

fewShots.question: Show total cost percent change for 2021
fewShots.query:
SELECT 
       ((SUM(CASE WHEN c.Year = 2021 THEN c.Tot_Drug_Cst ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN c.Year = 2020 THEN c.Tot_Drug_Cst ELSE 0 END)) / NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN c.Year = 2020 THEN c.Tot_Drug_Cst ELSE 0 END),0)) * 100 AS Cost_Percent_Change_2021_vs_2020
FROM [dbo].[cms_provider_drug_costs_star] c

fewShots.question: Show top 10 doctors in florida for total cost of statins
fewShots.query:
SELECT TOP 10 p.Prscrbr_Full_Name AS Doctor_Name,
       p.Prscrbr_Type AS Prescriber_Type, 
       SUM(c.Tot_Drug_Cst) AS Total_Cost
FROM [dbo].[cms_provider_drug_costs_star] c
JOIN [dbo].[cms_provider_dim_drug] d ON c.drug_key = d.drug_key
JOIN [dbo].[cms_provider_dim_geography] g ON c.geo_key = g.geo_key 
JOIN [dbo].[cms_provider_dim_provider] p ON c.provider_key = p.provider_key 
WHERE d.Gnrc_Name LIKE '%statin%' AND g.Prscrbr_State_Abrvtn = 'FL'
GROUP BY p.Prscrbr_Full_Name,p.Prscrbr_Type
ORDER BY Total_Cost DESC

fewShots.question: Show top 10 doctors who have total cost change greater than 10 and total days supply change greater than 10 in 2021 versus 2020
fewShots.query:
SELECT TOP 10 p.Prscrbr_Full_Name AS Prscrbr,
p.Prscrbr_Type AS Type,
SUM(CASE WHEN c.Year = 2021 THEN c.Tot_Drug_Cst ELSE 0 END) AS Tot_Cost_2021,
SUM(CASE WHEN c.Year = 2021 THEN c.Tot_Day_Suply ELSE 0 END) AS Tot_Day_Supply_2021,
SUM(CASE WHEN c.Year = 2021 THEN c.Tot_Drug_Cst ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN c.Year = 2020 THEN c.Tot_Drug_Cst ELSE 0 END) AS Tot_Cst_2021_chg,
SUM(CASE WHEN c.Year = 2021 THEN c.Tot_Day_Suply ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN c.Year = 2020 THEN c.Tot_Day_Suply ELSE 0 END) AS Tot_Day_Supply_2021_chg
FROM [dbo].[cms_provider_drug_costs_star] c
JOIN [dbo].[cms_provider_dim_provider] p ON c.provider_key = p.provider_key
GROUP BY p.Prscrbr_Full_Name, p.Prscrbr_Type
HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN c.Year = 2021 THEN c.Tot_Drug_Cst ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN c.Year = 2020 THEN c.Tot_Drug_Cst ELSE 0 END) > 10
AND SUM(CASE WHEN c.Year = 2021 THEN c.Tot_Day_Suply ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN c.Year = 2020 THEN c.Tot_Day_Suply ELSE 0 END) > 10
ORDER BY Tot_Cost_2021 DESC

fewShots.question: Total cost for beta blockers
fewShots.query:
SELECT 
       SUM(c.Tot_Drug_Cst) AS Total_Cost,
       d.Gnrc_Name AS Generic_Name
FROM [dbo].[cms_provider_drug_costs_star] c
JOIN [dbo].[cms_provider_dim_drug] d ON c.drug_key = d.drug_key
WHERE LOWER(d.Gnrc_Name) LIKE '%carvedilol%'
AND d.Gnrc_Name NOT LIKE '%carvedilol%'
GROUP BY d.Gnrc_Name
